name: Your Name
bio: Passionate developer with expertise in modern web technologies. I love building elegant solutions to complex problems.

experience.description: Built an interactive 2024 urban development allocation map for Banda Aceh using Next.js and Leaflet, focusing on geospatial visualization and data-driven planning.

projects.name: 21OSS
projects.description: An open-source resource hub that curates templates, components, tools, and assets for developers and creators. Built to help ship faster with practical, high-quality open-source resources.

projects.name: OG Table
projects.description: A tool for generating beautiful, modern table images for presentations and content. Built by reworking Raycast's ray.so codebase to create dynamic, styled tables instead of code snippets.

projects.name: Zona Petik
projects.description: A data-driven agricultural decision support system that analyzes weather data and forecasts rainfall using Holt-Winters to generate dynamic planting calendars for farmers.

projects.name: Headshota
projects.description: An open-source web app for generating natural, professional-looking AI headshots for social media from a single photo. Currently paused due to cost optimization work.
